name: RoboCake
description:
It is my first game (also my first jam) so I kept it short and simple! It maybe full of bugs! Hope you like it ! 

Rule of game is simple :

Find all the cakes and Reach portal without dying!

Feel free to comment about bugs !

Also I tried alot for playing death animation but couldn't get it working! 🤔

All Sprite and Tileset are made by me!

Other credits:
emwedo for textfont (Used in cake score)
pizzadude for textfont (Used in Main Menu)
Erie from Opengameart.org for background music
Background Images taken from craftpix.net's itch.io page
Sounds made in sfxr!

Hope you all like my cute character! ❤❤

Controls:

AD or arrow keys for movement.

W or Up arrow for jump.
